```{r}
library(onemap)
data("fake.f2.onemap")
fake.f2.onemap
twopts.f2 <- rf.2pts(fake.f2.onemap)
mark.all.f2 <- make.seq(twopts.f2, "all")
LGs.f2 <- group(mark.all.f2, LOD=3, max.rf=0.5)
LGs.f2
set.map.fun(type="haldane")
LG2.f2 <- make.seq(LGs.f2, 2)
LG2.f2
```
